instructionText: Take or select a photo to identify crop diseases
featureComingSoon: will be available in the next update
aboutDescription: AI-Powered Precision Agriculture System for Sustainable Crop Management in Rwanda
aboutContent: This application uses computer vision and machine learning to detect crop diseases and provide management recommendations to farmers.
noteContent: This is an MVP version. For most accurate results, ensure good lighting and clear focus on the affected area.
positionPlant: Position the plant leaf in the center
